pages.text: End's Delight brings new culinary creations to the mysterious End dimension. $(br2)Cook up unique recipes using chorus fruit, Ender pearls, and other exotic ingredients.
Start by crafting a Chorus Cake using chorus fruit and other ingredients. $(br2)Enjoy dishes like Ender Stir Fry and Void Soup, and enhance your meals with Phantom Jelly.
Expand your cooking repertoire with dishes that will teleport your taste buds to another dimension. $(br2)End's Delight adds an otherworldly flavor to your meals!
